1.text: Pour 1 cup (201 g) of sea salt into a bowl.

2.text: Add in 1⁄4  c (59 mL) of olive oil or coconut oil.

3.text: Drop in 3 drops of peppermint essential oil.

4.text: Use this scrub for a refreshing exfoliant.

5.text: Store the foot scrub in an airtight container.

6.text: Add 2 cups (400 g) of granulated sugar to a bowl.

7.text: Mix in 15 US tbsp (220 mL) of almond oil or coconut oil.

8.text: Add in 10 to 20 drops of lemon essential oil.

9.text: Try this scrub to refresh your feet with a citrus zest.

10.text: Keep your foot scrub in an airtight container.

11.text: Spoon about 1/4 cup (32 g) of coffee grounds into a bowl.

12.text: Add in 1⁄2  c (120 mL) of olive oil or coconut oil.

13.text: Mix in 1.5 tbsp (22.5 g) of cinnamon.

14.text: Use this scrub to wake up your skin.

15.text: Store the mixture in an airtight container.

16.text: Mix 1/2 cup (64 g) of brown sugar with 1⁄4  c (59 mL) of canola oil.

17.text: Add in 1  tsp (4.9 mL) of vanilla extract.

18.text: Use this scrub for a naturally scented exfoliant.

19.text: Store the scrub in an airtight container.
